description.value: All that remains of a darkling is a fine, dark powder that smells of soot. Alchemists and magic users often acquire the ash for the tiny bit of magical essence that it contains. Use: When you cast the darkness spell, you may expend 1 or more pouches of this ash instead of the usual material components. If you do so, the radius of the magical darkness you create expands by 5 feet for every pouch of ash used.
